00007 #include "DoubleSolenoid.h"

00012 void DoubleSolenoid::InitSolenoid()
00013 {
00014     if (CheckSolenoidModule(m_chassisSlot))
00015     {
00016         CheckSolenoidChannel(m_forwardChannel);
00017         CheckSolenoidChannel(m_reverseChannel);
00018         Resource::CreateResourceObject(&m_allocated, tSolenoid::kNumDO7_0Elements * kSolenoidChannels);
00019 
00020         m_allocated->Allocate(SlotToIndex(m_chassisSlot) * kSolenoidChannels + m_forwardChannel - 1);
00021         m_allocated->Allocate(SlotToIndex(m_chassisSlot) * kSolenoidChannels + m_reverseChannel - 1);
00022     }
00023     m_forwardMask = 1 << (m_forwardChannel - 1);
00024     m_reverseMask = 1 << (m_reverseChannel - 1);
00025 }
00026 
00033 DoubleSolenoid::DoubleSolenoid(UINT32 forwardChannel, UINT32 reverseChannel)
00034     : SolenoidBase (GetDefaultSolenoidModule())
00035     , m_forwardChannel (forwardChannel)
00036     , m_reverseChannel (reverseChannel)
00037 {
00038     InitSolenoid();
00039 }
00040 
00048 DoubleSolenoid::DoubleSolenoid(UINT32 slot, UINT32 forwardChannel, UINT32 reverseChannel)
00049     : SolenoidBase (slot)
00050     , m_forwardChannel (forwardChannel)
00051     , m_reverseChannel (reverseChannel)
00052 {
00053     InitSolenoid();
00054 }
00055 
00059 DoubleSolenoid::~DoubleSolenoid()
00060 {
00061     if (CheckSolenoidModule(m_chassisSlot))
00062     {
00063         m_allocated->Free(SlotToIndex(m_chassisSlot) * kSolenoidChannels + m_forwardChannel - 1);
00064         m_allocated->Free(SlotToIndex(m_chassisSlot) * kSolenoidChannels + m_reverseChannel - 1);
00065     }
00066 }
00067 
00073 void DoubleSolenoid::Set(Value value)
00074 {
00075     UINT8 rawValue;
00076 
00077     switch(value)
00078     {
00079     case kOff:
00080         rawValue = 0x00;
00081         break;
00082     case kForward:
00083         rawValue = m_forwardMask;
00084         break;
00085     case kReverse:
00086         rawValue = m_reverseMask;
00087         break;
00088     }
00089 
00090     SolenoidBase::Set(rawValue, m_forwardMask | m_reverseMask);
00091 }
00092 
00098 DoubleSolenoid::Value DoubleSolenoid::Get()
00099 {
00100     UINT8 value = GetAll();
00101 
00102     if (value & m_forwardMask) return kForward;
00103     if (value & m_reverseMask) return kReverse;
00104     return kOff;
00105 }
